content: मकरः [मं विषं किरति क-अच् <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A kind of sea-animal, a crocodile, shark; झषाणां मकरश्चास्मि <ls>Bg. 10. 31</ls>; मकरवक्त्र <ls>Bh. 2. 4.</ls> (Makara is regarded as an emblem of Cupid; <ab>cf.</ab> comps. below). {@--2@} The sign {%Capri%} {%cornus%} of the zodiac. {@--3@} An array of troops in the form of a Makara. {@--4@} An ear-ring in the shape of a Makara. {@--5@} The hands folded in the form of a Makara. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the nine treasures of Kubera. {@--7@} The tenth arc of thirty degrees in any circle.
